name: Simran Jain
title: Principal Data Scientist | Amateur Theatre Artist
text: Nivesh worked with me at the very beginning of his career and even at that early stage he showed incredible maturity in the work he did. He could see the bigger picture, beyond what he was tasked with and as a result he brought valuable ideas to the table. He's a quick study and onboarded onto any new project with ease. I have seen him raise the bar for himself repeatedly. He was a treasured teammate and I had a great time working with him!

text: I had the pleasure of working with Nivesh, and they’re one of those fun people who combine deep technical strength with a genuinely fun and positive attitude. name: Aatheep Gurubaran
title: Data Analyst
meta: November 12, 2025, Aatheep worked with Nivesh on the same team
text:
I had the chance to work closely with Nivesh on multiple Real World Evidence (RWE) studies at Mu Sigma. He built several custom R packages that streamlined key parts of our analysis workflow. Tasks that once took hours were reduced to minutes, and those tools are still being used by the team even five years later. His technical depth and problem solving mindset consistently improved the team’s output and efficiency.
 Beyond his technical skills, Nivesh was one of the most collaborative teammates I have worked with. He actively contributed to cross learning sessions, shared new methods and tools, and helped others upskill in R and data science best practices. His mix of technical rigor and team first attitude made a lasting impact on the group.
